Field.Label: Supports temperatureSensorCount:
Field.Description: Show temperatureSensorCount in UI

Field.Label: Supports heat setpoint:
Field.Description: Show heat setpoint controls in UI

Field.Label: Supports cool setpoint:
Field.Description: Show cool setpoint controls in UI

Field.Label: Supports thermostat modes:
Field.Description: Show thermostat mode controls (heat/cool/auto) in UI

Field.Label: Supports thermostat temperature reporting:
Field.Description: Supports thermostat temperature reporting

Field.Label: Supports thermostat valve control:
Field.Description: Supports thermostat valve control

Field.Label: Supports fan modes:
Field.Description: Show fan mode controls (auto/always on) in UI

Field.Label: Supports compressor/furnace feedback:
Field.Description: Show compressor/furnace states in UI

Field.Label: Supports Battery Level:
Field.Description: Show Battery Level in UI

Field.Label: ^ Select the TRV device to be controlled by this TRV Controller.
^ Select Heating Source device that will be requested to provide heat when the TRV is calling for heat.
Note: If there is no Heating Source device listed then change the Plugin Config to disable heating source validation.
^ Select the Heating Source variable that will be requested to provide heat when the TRV is calling for heat.
^ Specify a short name (say, max 10 characters) to be used to uniquely identify this device within a CSV file name
Hide Temperature Broadcasts:
Field.Description: Hide broadcasts in Event Log

Field.Label: ^ Select the preferred method to specify the Heat Setpoint when the device is started.
^ Specify the temperature that will be used as the Heat Setpoint for the device when the device is started.
^ Specify the default ON temperature that will be used as the Heat Setpoint if the device is manually turned on.
^ Specify the maximum number of degrees to increase the TRV Heat Setpoint by in order to ensure the TRV is controlled by the Remote Thermostat and not turned off too early.
TRV Supports HVAC ON/OFF - HIDDEN:
Field.Description: Set by Plugin depending on TRV model

Field.Label: TRV Supports ON/OFF:
Field.Description: Set by Plugin depending on TRV model

Field.Label: ^ Set by Plugin depending on TRV model.
Default TRV Maximum Settable Temperature [FULLY ON]:
^ Set by Plugin depending on TRV model unless overridden.
TRV Maximum Settable Temperature [FULLY ON]:
Field.Description: Override?

Field.Label: ^ Specify a valiue that is > 21 and less than the TRV Maximum Settable Temperature [FULLY ON].
Valve Assistance:
Field.Description: Assist TRV using valve commands

Field.Label: ^ As this TRV supports Valve Commands, selecting this option can help expedite the response of the TRV to a setpoint change and also help ameliorate the situation where the TRV sometimes gets into a false state e.g. says it is off when the valve is still open. The plugin default setting is ON.
TRV ON/OFF:
Field.Description: Set OFF when at minimum Heat Setpoint else ON

Field.Label: ^ If the TRV supports HVAC ON/OFF Commands, selecting this option enables logic to turn the TRV off when the TRV Heat Setpoint is set to the minimum otherwise set to on. This may sometimes help in those circumstances where the TRV doesn't fully turn off when set to the mimimum [YMMV].
TRV Remote Control:
Field.Description: Check to select Remote Thermostat to control TRV

Field.Label: ^ Optionally, select a remote thermostat (or temperature measuring device) that can be used to control the TRV.
Remote Setpoint Heat Adjustment:
Field.Description: Check to enable manual adjustment.

Field.Label: ^ Specify the maximum number of degrees to exceed the TRV Heat Setpoint to ensure the TRV is controlled by the Remote Thermostat and not turned off too early.
^ Specify the temperature offset that will be applied to the temperature returned by the remote thermostat e.g 0.5 or -1.0.
Confirm if scheduled heating is required and if so select mode 'ON/OFF' or 'By setpoint Only'.
Select up to four schedules and define the ON and OFF times and heat setpoints to be used by this device for the enabled schedules.
Select up to ten schedules and define the time and heat setpoint to be used by this device for each enabled schedule.
Heating Schedule One:
Field.Description: Check to enable and set options.
